m_szDocTitle: Learning by Shipping | products, development, management…
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Learning by Shipping Thank you for stopping by and reading posts here on Learning By Shipping. The learning continues, but new posts can now be found on Medium.  Please visit http://medium.learningbyshipping.com . This site will remain archived and supported and occasionally will receive cross-posts. Thank you for your support, —Steven Sinofsky Disruption’s Long, Slow, Complex Journey The original 1995 HBR article on disruption from Joseph Bower and Clay Christensen was titled “Disruptive Technologies: Catching the Wave”. If you work in traditional retail you h
